transArray.content: The hotel front desk service is very good. The room is clean and hygienic. The restaurant has a wide variety of dishes and is delicious. Love this hotel. I will stay at this hotel next time. Recommend everyone to stay at this hotel

Dear guest, hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. The products and services provided by the hotel are of reliable quality. We always put hygiene first and provide guests with a safe and comfortable stay. We are constantly moving forward. Target, thank you very much for your recognition of the breakfast in the hotel. Only by living well and eating well can you feel like home. All the staff at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel look forward to your next stay, thank you! General Manager: Li Changxia
